## Functions

### adjustedSumFreq() {#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BlockFrequency adjustedSumFreq (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; BBs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return adjusted total frequency of <code>BBs</code>.

<ul>
<li>If there is only one BB, sinking instruction will not introduce code size increase. Thus there is no need to adjust the frequency.</li>
<li>If there are more than one BB, sinking would lead to code size increase. In this case, we add some &quot;tax&quot; to the total frequency to make it harder to sink. E.g. Freq(Preheader) = 100 Freq(BBs) = sum(50, 49) = 99 Even if Freq(BBs) &lt; Freq(Preheader), we will not sink from Preheade to BBs as the difference is too small to justify the code size increase. To model this, The adjusted Freq(BBs) will be: AdjustedFreq(BBs) = 99 / SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold%</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopsink-cpp">LoopSink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findBBsToSinkInto() {#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SmallPtrSet&lt; BasicBlock &#42;, 2 &gt; findBBsToSinkInto (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; UseBBs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; ColdLoopBBs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp; DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a set of basic blocks to insert sinked instructions.

The returned set of basic blocks (BBsToSinkInto) should satisfy:


<ul>
<li>Inside the loop <code>L</code></li>
<li>For each UseBB in <code>UseBBs</code>, there is at least one BB in BBsToSinkInto that domintates the UseBB</li>
<li>Has minimum total frequency that is no greater than preheader frequency</li>
</ul>


The purpose of the function is to find the optimal sinking points to minimize execution cost, which is defined as &quot;sum of frequency of
BBsToSinkInto&quot;. As a result, the returned BBsToSinkInto needs to have minimum total frequency. Additionally, if the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto exceeds preheader frequency, the optimal solution is not sinking (return empty set).

<code>ColdLoopBBs</code> is used to help find the optimal sinking locations. It stores a list of BBs that is:


<ul>
<li>Inside the loop <code>L</code></li>
<li>Has a frequency no larger than the loop&#39;s preheader</li>
<li>Sorted by BB frequency</li>
</ul>


The complexity of the function is O(UseBBs.size() &#42; ColdLoopBBs.size()). To avoid expensive computation, we cap the maximum UseBBs.size() in its caller.

Definition at line <a href="#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopsink-cpp">LoopSink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass does the inverse transformation of what LICM does.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It traverses all of the instructions in the loop&#39;s preheader and sinks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them to the loop body where frequency is lower than the loop&#39;s preheader.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass is a reverse-transformation of LICM. It differs from the Sink</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass in the following ways:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; It only handles sinking of instructions from the loop&#39;s preheader to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   loop&#39;s body</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; It uses alias set tracker to get more accurate alias info</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; It uses block frequency info to find the optimal sinking locations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Overall algorithm:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For I in Preheader:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   InsertBBs = BBs that uses I</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   For BB in sorted(LoopBBs):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     DomBBs = BBs in InsertBBs that are dominated by BB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     if freq(DomBBs) &gt; freq(BB)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       InsertBBs = UseBBs - DomBBs + BB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   For BB in InsertBBs:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Insert I at BB&#39;s beginning</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2">SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;sink-freq-percent-threshold&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(90),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="#ae32df5d3058e3f6d41b013da96a14a6c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#ae32df5d3058e3f6d41b013da96a14a6c">MaxNumberOfUseBBsForSinking</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;max-uses-for-sinking&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(30),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Do not sink instructions that have too many uses.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return adjusted total frequency of \\p BBs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; If there is only one BB, sinking instruction will not introduce code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///   size increase. Thus there is no need to adjust the frequency.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; If there are more than one BB, sinking would lead to code size increase.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///   In this case, we add some &quot;tax&quot; to the total frequency to make it harder</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///   to sink. E.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///     Freq(Preheader) = 100</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///     Freq(BBs) = sum(50, 49) = 99</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Even if Freq(BBs) &lt; Freq(Preheader), we will not sink from Preheade to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BBs as the difference is too small to justify the code size increase.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///   To model this, The adjusted Freq(BBs) will be:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">///     AdjustedFreq(BBs) = 99 / SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold%</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;BBs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;BFI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : BBs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> += BFI.getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> /= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(<a href="#a7c7f81f626abc2612de61d8742db93f2">SinkFrequencyPercentThreshold</a>, 100);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return a set of basic blocks to insert sinked instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The returned set of basic blocks (BBsToSinkInto) should satisfy:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Inside the loop \\p L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; For each UseBB in \\p UseBBs, there is at least one BB in BBsToSinkInto</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///   that domintates the UseBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Has minimum total frequency that is no greater than preheader frequency</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The purpose of the function is to find the optimal sinking points to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// minimize execution cost, which is defined as &quot;sum of frequency of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BBsToSinkInto&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// As a result, the returned BBsToSinkInto needs to have minimum total</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// frequency.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Additionally, if the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto exceeds preheader</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// frequency, the optimal solution is not sinking (return empty set).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p ColdLoopBBs is used to help find the optimal sinking locations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It stores a list of BBs that is:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Inside the loop \\p L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Has a frequency no larger than the loop&#39;s preheader</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Sorted by BB frequency</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The complexity of the function is O(UseBBs.size() &#42; ColdLoopBBs.size()).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To avoid expensive computation, we cap the maximum UseBBs.size() in its</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// caller.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a8db2bdc3994fcf7d2631f887443ad477">findBBsToSinkInto</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;UseBBs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;ColdLoopBBs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &amp;BFI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> BBsToSinkInto;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BBsToSinkInto;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>(), UseBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a7004354fbee1c8cd74ed9001915e1db5">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt;</a> BBsDominatedByColdestBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For every iteration:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Pick the ColdestBB from ColdLoopBBs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Find the set BBsDominatedByColdestBB that satisfy:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     - BBsDominatedByColdestBB is a subset of BBsToSinkInto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     - Every BB in BBsDominatedByColdestBB is dominated by ColdestBB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; If Freq(ColdestBB) &lt; Freq(BBsDominatedByColdestBB), remove</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     BBsDominatedByColdestBB from BBsToSinkInto, add ColdestBB to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     BBsToSinkInto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ColdestBB : ColdLoopBBs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SinkedBB : BBsToSinkInto)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(ColdestBB, SinkedBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(SinkedBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBsDominatedByColdestBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsDominatedByColdestBB, BFI) &gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">        BFI.getBlockFreq(ColdestBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DominatedBB : BBsDominatedByColdestBB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">        BBsToSinkInto.erase(DominatedBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      BBsToSinkInto.insert(ColdestBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, see if we can stop the search through the cold BBs early.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since the ColdLoopBBs list is sorted in increasing magnitude of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frequency the cold BB frequencies can only get larger. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BBsToSinkInto set can only get smaller and have a smaller</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// adjustedSumFreq, due to the earlier checking. So once we find a cold BB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a frequency at least as large as the adjustedSumFreq of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current BBsToSinkInto set, the earlier frequency check can never be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// true for a future iteration. Note we could do check this more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aggressively earlier, but in practice this ended up being more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expensive overall (added checking to the critical path through the loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that often ended up continuing early due to an empty</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BBsDominatedByColdestBB set, and the frequency check there was false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// most of the time anyway).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsToSinkInto, BFI) &lt;= BFI.getBlockFreq(ColdestBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t sink into blocks that have no valid insertion point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : BBsToSinkInto) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt() == BB-&gt;end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the total frequency of BBsToSinkInto is larger than preheader frequency,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// do not sink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad05635f074426ec888ca6cf930613024">adjustedSumFreq</a>(BBsToSinkInto, BFI) &gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      BFI.getBlockFreq(L.getLoopPreheader()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    BBsToSinkInto.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a16413f1a88d8baca228d0a1b4cc0bfc6">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BBsToSinkInto;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sinks \\p I from the loop \\p L&#39;s preheader to its uses. Returns true if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sinking is successful.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="#a89374dd34ed723e45309afa9ac10eb83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a89374dd34ed723e45309afa9ac10eb83">sinkInstruction</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enable LoopSink only when runtime profile is available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to do a postorder walk over the loops. Since loops are a tree this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is equivalent to a reversed preorder walk and preorder is easy to compute</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// without recursion. Since we reverse the preorder, we will visit siblings</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in reverse program order. This isn&#39;t expected to matter at all but is more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// consistent with sinking algorithms which generally work bottom-up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Loop &#42;, 4&gt;</a> PreorderLoops = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0">getLoopsInPreorder</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L = &#42;PreorderLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Preheader = L.getLoopPreheader();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Preheader)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that we don&#39;t pass SCEV here because it is only used to invalidate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops in SCEV and we don&#39;t preserve (or request) SCEV at all making that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unnecessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;ScalarEvolution&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PreorderLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
